pages.text: 30|51|Ruguo wo shi yizhenfeng chui qu, er tamen kanjian hemiao bian cheng weihuang de, cihou, tamen jiu biding bian cheng gu en zhe.
30|52|Ni bi buneng shi siren ting (ni jiang jiao), ni bi buneng shi tuibi de longzi ting ni huhuan.
30|53|Ni bi buneng yindao xiazi likai mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi quexin wo de jixiang de ren ting ni (jiang jiao), tamen shi guishun zhe.

30|54|An la ba nimen cong nuoruo zhong chuangzao, zai nuoruo zhihou, you ba nimen chuangzao cheng qiangzhuang de, zai qiangzhuang zhihou you shi nimen chengwei nuoruo de he bai fa cangcang de, ta yao chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de.
30|55|Fuhuo shi jianglin zhi ri, fanzui de ren fa shi shuo: Tamen zhi douliule yi shashi, tamen yuan shi zheyang beimiu de.
30|56|You xuewen he you zhengxin de ren shuo:“Yi an la de qian ding, nimen que yi douliu dao fuhuo ri. Zhe jiushi fuhuo ri, dan nimen bu zhidao.”
30|57|Zai na ri, bu yi zhe de bian ci, wu bi yu zishen, tamen ye bude yao en.
30|58|Zai zhe “gulanjing” zhong, wo que yi wei zhongren shele ge zhong piyu. Ruguo ni zhaoshi tamen yi zhong jixiang, name, bu xindao zhe biding shuo:“Nimen zhishi huang xian de!”
30|59|An la jiu zheyang fengbi wuzhishi zhe de xin.
30|60|Ni jianren ba, an la de yingxu que shi zhenshi de. Ni buyao rang bu jianxin de ren shi ni qingshuai.
